functionality.description: simulated outputs of the performance based functional recovery methodology

recovery.description: simulated tenant- and building-level functional recovery and reoccupancy outcomes

reoccupancy.description: simulated tenant- and building-level reoccupancy outcomes

recovery_day.description: simulated building reoccupancy time, in days

initial_percent_affected.description: simulated portion of building that is non-occupiable, initially after the earthquake

recovery_day.description: simulated reoccupancy time, in days, for each tenant-unit in the building

recovery_trajectory.description: simulated recovery trajectory vectors; tracks the recovery of occupancy over time

recovery_day.description: simulated reoccupancy time, in days, for each step of the recovery trajectory (x-axis)

percent_recovered.description: each step of the recovery trajectory; step increment is equal to the inverse of the number of tenant-units in the building

breakdowns.description: deagregated reoccupancy times for various recovery targets (in days)

system_breakdowns.description: fraction of realization affected by loss of reoccupancy anywhere in the building, broken down by systems-level fault tree events

component_breakdowns.description: fraction of realization affected by loss of reoccupancy anywhere in the building, broken down by component

system_names.description: names of each of the systems in the systems_breakdowns field

comp_names.description: names of each of the components in the component_breakdowns field

functional.description: simulated tenant- and building-level functional recovery outcomes

building_level.description: simulated tenant- and building-level functional recovery outcomes

recovery_day.description: simulated building functional recovery time, in days

initial_percent_affected.description: simulated portion of building that is non-functional, initially after the earthquake

recovery_day.description: simulated functional recovery time, in days, for each tenant-unit in the building

recovery_trajectory.description: simulated recovery trajectory vectors; tracks the recovery of function over time

recovery_day.description: simulated functional recovery time, in days, for each step of the recovery trajectory (x-axis)

percent_recovered.description: each step of the recovery trajectory; step increment is equal to the inverse of the number of tenant-units in the building

breakdowns.description: deagregated functional recovery times for various recovery targets (in days)

system_breakdowns.description: fraction of realization affected by loss of function anywhere in the building, broken down by systems-level fault tree events

component_breakdowns.description: fraction of realization affected by loss of function, not including reoccupancy, anywhere in the building, broken down by component

system_names.description: names of each of the systems in the systems_breakdowns field

comp_names.description: names of each of the components in the component_breakdowns field

component_combined.description: fraction of realization affected by loss of function, including reocupancy, anywhere in the building, broken down by component

repair_start_day.description: the day after the earthquake that each repair starts

per_component.description: repair start day of each component

per_story.description: repair start day of each story

per_system.description: repair start day of each system

per_system_story.description: repair start day of each story within each system

per_story_system.description: repair start day of each system on each story

repair_complete_day.description: the day after the earthquake that each repair is finished

per_component.description: repair complete day of each component

per_story.description: repair complete day of each story

per_system.description: repair complete day of each system

per_system_story.description: repair complete day of each story within each system

per_story_system.description: repair complete day of each system on each story

component_names.description: names of each of the components in the per_component breakdown field

system_names.description: names of each of the systems in the per_system breakdown field

worker_data.description: simulated worker allocations throughout the repair schedule

total_workers.description: simulated worker allocated in the building for any repair at various time steps

day_vector.description: various time steps, in days after the earthquake, associated with the total_workers field

time_sys.description: simulated total impeding time for each system

breakdowns.description: simulated impeding factor times broken down by factor

eng_mob.description: simulated engineering mobilization time for each system

design.description: simulated engineering design time for each system

permitting.description: simulated permitting time for each system

contractor_mob.description: simulated contractor mobilization time for each system
